snippet: Google and other technology stocks lifted the markets on Friday, with the Dow Jones industrial average and the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index closing at highs.
abstract: Dow Jones industrial average and Standard & Poor's 500-stock index end at milestone highs as shares post third consecutive week of gains when rise in Google and other technology shares offset slide in energy stocks.
lead_paragraph: Google and other technology stocks lifted the markets on Friday, with the Dow Jones industrial average and the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index closing at highs.

headline.main: Week Finishes on a High Note for the Markets
headline.print_headline: Week Finishes on High Note for Dow and S.&P. 500, With an Assist From the Tech Sector
